text: Bernard Rudolf "Ben" Bot (; born 21 November 1937) is a Dutch politician. He was a member of the Christian Democratic Appeal (CDA). He was Minister of Foreign Affairs from 3 December 2003 until 22 February 2007, replacing Jaap de Hoop Scheffer who resigned to become Secretary General of NATO in 2003.
